title: Montelukast
summary: Montelukast, sold under the brand name Singulair among others, is a medication used in the maintenance treatment of asthma.[4] It is generally less preferred for this use than inhaled corticosteroids.[4] It is not useful for acute asthma attacks.[4] Other uses include allergic rhinitis and hives of long duration.[4] For allergic rhinitis it is a second-line treatment.[5]
